name: Your Time (SWKsoft)
description:
OVERVIEW

Many years ago, there was a small and quiet village, which won the love of the whole country for the kindness of its inhabitants and how comfortable it was to vacation there.
What was for a long time a beautiful anecdote, became a legend that few remember and finally passed into oblivion.
Everyone's favorite place to enjoy the summer lost all its tourists and inhabitants in just a few months, leaving only two people to its credit. What are they doing there? Why don't they run away? We will have to meet them in person to understand (if anyone dares to enter that unexplored territory).

Also

Any fanart, critique, bug report, correction or contribution is more than welcome. It could be part of future content featured in new updates!
This is my second attempt to make a VN, quite similar to my first work in concept, with a totally different aproach. The story is way simplier and "jam-friendly." So I hope you enjoy it!
I'm still struggling writting in english and programming, but this is just the beggining!
